src.UI

Class SecurityLampSimulatedUI

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.awt.Component
      • java.awt.Container
        • javax.swing.JComponent
          • javax.swing.JPanel
            • src.UI.SecurityLampSimulatedUI
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable, javax.accessibility.Accessible, LightDeviceInterface

    public class SecurityLampSimulatedUI
extends javax.swing.JPanel
implements LightDeviceInterface
    This class implements a basic UI for usage with the light controller. It simulates that which would exist in a real world light timer implementation.
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
